scene.width = 700
scene.height = 400

g = 9.81
h = 10
v0 = 20
b = 0.1

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, h, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.red)
floor = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(30, 0.2, 10), color=color.green)

t = 0
dt = 0.01

while t < 3:
    rate(100)
    t += dt
    ball.pos.x += v0 * dt
    ball.pos.y -= 0.5 * g * (t ** 2) - v0 * b * t

    if ball.pos.y <= ball.radius:
        ball.pos.y = ball.radius
        v0 *= -0.9

Elasticity_I = 5

def update_scene():
    global Elasticity_I, v0
    v0 = 20
    Elasticity_I = mass2

scene.bind('keydown', update_scene)
log.output:
scene.width = 700
scene.height = 400

g = 9.81
h = 10
v0 = 20
Elasticity_I = 5  # Initial elasticity value

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, h, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.red)
floor = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(30, 0.2, 10), color=color.green)

t = 0
dt = 0.01

while t < 3:
    rate(100)
    t += dt
    ball.pos.x += v0 * dt
    ball.pos.y -= 0.5 * g * (t ** 2) - v0 * b * t

    if ball.pos.y <= ball.radius:
        ball.pos.y = ball.radius
        v0 *= -Elasticity_I/10

def update_scene():
    global v0
    v0 = 20

scene.bind('keydown', update_scene)
